name: Flow Poker: The On-Chain Agent-Ran Casino
tagline: A fully on-chain Dice Poker experience on Flow, powered by AI agents.
description: Flow Poker is a fully on-chain, agent-powered Dice Poker experience built on the Flow blockchain. It features a ruthless AI dealer powered by LangChain with On-chain Contract Interaction, ReAct agent architecture, and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) for decisionmaking and user communication, grounded in live on-chain data. Gameplay is secured by Flow's native VRF for provably fair randomness, and the AI autonomously manages its wallet, strategizes, and interacts with players using real-time blockchain intelligence. The project demonstrates a cutting-edge agentic casino concept blending blockchain transparency, verifiable randomness, and autonomous personality-driven agents.
